message:
DuckDuckGo offers excellent no-tracking search results.
It has tons of shortcuts (called "bangs") for searching in other sites. For example: use !yt to search YouTube
https://duckduckgo.com/bang.html
It has direct answers to common questions and other goodies
https://duckduckgo.com/goodies
You can change settings
https://duckduckgo.com/settings
You can even teach it new tricks and share it with everyone
http://duckduckhack.com/
I've been using it non-stop for almost 3 weeks now and loved it.
Try it
https://duckduckgo.com/
name: Search DuckDuckGo
caption: duckduckgo.com
description: Search anonymously. Find instantly. DuckDuckGo is a search engine that does not track you and, has more instant answers and less spam/clutter.

data.message: Mohammed: it uses almost every other search engine, but even then, what's wrong with that?
No I am not saying it is wrong. I used to work on Bing.
I don't really mind if it uses Bing or even Google. It's free, open, and no-tracking/private. Good enough.
